overview: Relive the finest moments of the West Virginia Mountaineers' standout 2006-07 season, when head coach Rich Rodriguez led his team to a triumphant 11-2 record, culminating in a nail-biting come-from-behind victory in the Toyota Gator Bowl. Don't miss a play from this highlight reel that includes game footage and an insider's look at the coaching secrets that have made West Virginia football a powerhouse to be reckoned with.
title: 2006-2007 West Virginia: Season in Review
